scripts.build: next build && next export && git add . && git commit -m "Add updated build"
scripts.copy-build-to-temp: cd .. && cp -r frontend-confessions-generator-from-template/out temp && echo "Copied build to temp" && pwd
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cd .. && cp -r frontend-confessions-generator-from-template/out temp && echo "Copied build to temp" && git switch gh-pages && cd .. && cp -r temp frontend-confessions-generator-from-template && echo "Copied temp to gh-pages" && git add . && git commit -m "Add updated build" && git push
